description: Try our easy to follow CT's Mini Footies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bliss & protein ball,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Back to school,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: CT's Mini Footies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup desicated coconut (2 tbs reserved for garnishing)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the dates in a bowl and add the melted coconut oil.
Using your hands break down the dates into a soft paste.
Add the remaining dry ingredients and using your hands again, combine together well.
Wet your hands and roll into 50 cent piece balls and then roll the balls in the remaining coconut to cover.
Shape into footballs and refrigerate until firm.
